body:
Requested by @laanwj in #8423 (which addresses some of these by upgrading packages) + #8923.

This should probably be a new file in `doc/`, as it is not specific to any one platform.
Also checks in `configure.ac` would need to be added to check if these versions are present.

| Dependancy | Version used | Minimum Required | Latest available | CVEs? | Shared | [Bundled Qt Library](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/configure-options.html) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| openssl | 1.0.1k |  | [1.0.1u](https://www.openssl.org/source) | Yes |  |  |
| libevent | 2.1.8-stable | 2.0.22 | [2.1.10-stable](https://github.com/libevent/libevent/releases) | No |  |  |
| Qt | 5.9.7 | [5.5.1](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/13478) | [5.13.0](https://download.qt.io/official_releases/qt/) | No |  |  |
| Freetype | 2.7.1 |  | [2.10.1](https://download.savannah.gnu.org/releases/freetype) | No |  |  |
| Boost | 1.70.0 | [1.47.0](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8920) | [1.70.0](http://www.boost.org/users/download/) | No |  |  |
| Protobuf | 2.6.1 |  | [3.9.0](https://github.com/google/protobuf/releases) | No |  |  |
| Zeromq | 4.3.1 | 4.0  | [4.3.2](https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/releases) | Yes |  |  |
| miniupnpc | 2.0.20180203 |  | [2.1.20190625](http://miniupnp.free.fr/files) | No |  |  |
| qrencode | 3.4.4 |  | [4.0.2](https://fukuchi.org/works/qrencode) | No |  |  |
| berkeley-db | 4.8.30 | 4.8.x | [18.1.32](https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/database/database-technologies/berkeleydb/downloads/index.html) | No |  |  |
| expat | 2.2.7 |  | [2.2.7](https://libexpat.github.io/) | No | yes |  |
| fontconfig | 2.12.1 |  | [2.13.1](https://www.freedesktop.org/software/fontconfig/release/) | No | yes |  |
| freetype |  |  |  |  |  | [no](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/depends/packages/qt.mk#L34) (linux uses system) |
| zlib | 1.2.11 |  | [1.2.11](https://zlib.net/) |  |  | no |
| libpng |  |  |  |  |  | [yes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/depends/packages/qt.mk#L65) |

| Python (tests) |  | 3.5 | [3.7.4](https://www.python.org/downloads) |  |  |  |
| GCC |  | 4.8+ | [9.1](https://gcc.gnu.org/) |  |  |  |
